testsuite.name: com.auction.verifications.TimedSale
testsuite.system-out:
Installation URL >> https://qa-dev-auto.auctionserver.net/admin/login?url=https%3A%2F%2Fqa-dev-auto.auctionserver.net%2Fadmin%2Fmanage-home

Step :: Enter admin username :: admin

Step :: Enter admin password :: 123123

Step :: Click on login button.

Step :: Click on auction overview page.

Step :: Click on create new auction button.

Step :: Select auction type.

Auction type :: Timed

Step :: Select timezone.

Step :: Select start closing date and time.

Step :: Select publish date and time.

Step :: Select start bidding date and time.

Step :: Select start register date and time.

Step :: Enter sale name.

Step :: Click on save changes button.

Auction name :: nhjpoe

Sale # :: 1007348

Step :: Auction URL: >> https://qa-dev-auto.auctionserver.net/admin/manage-auctions/edit/id/10822

Step :: Go to settings tab.

Step :: Select auction currency = $.

Step :: Select auctioner sagar.

Step :: Click on save changes button.

Step :: Click on lots tab.

Step :: Click on add lot button.

Step :: Enter quantity.

Step :: Enter lot name.

Step :: Enter starting bid.

Step :: Select category.

Step :: Check the 'No tax on sales outside of state' checkbox

Step :: Check returned checkbox.

Step :: Check the featured lot checkbox.

Step :: Click on save button.

Step :: Enter valid values in lot field: Error Please see below for missing/false entries

Step :: Enter a lot number.

Step :: Enter quantity.

Step :: Enter starting bid.

Step :: Enter a cost.

Step :: Enter replacement Price.

Step :: Enter a reserve price.

Step :: Click on save button.

Step :: Confirm date.

Verified lot saved successfully : Success Item saved
